definition[0]: having advantages because of your wealth, social position etc
example[0]: Students from a privileged background have an advantage at university.
example[1]: Only the privileged few can afford private education.
definition[2]: having a special advantage or a chance to do something that most people cannot do
example[2]: Kylie feels fortunate to be in such a privileged position because of her successful TV career.
example[3]: I was privileged to lead the team.
definition[3]: privileged information is private and is not allowed to be made public by law
